treatment.description: Annuals, 5–45 cm; vestiture hirsuto-pilose and/or puberulent, stem hairs spreading to deflexed, 0.1–0.3 mm. Phyllary apices acute to short-acuminate. Ray florets (10–)25–45. Disc floret corollas: bases (mature) bulbous-swollen, indurate. Cypselae: hairs apically 1-directionally coiled; pappi usually coroniform, uneven, rarely of acute to awn-tipped scales 0.2–2 mm.

key_statement.statement: Leaves thickened, densely, almost felty gray-hairy; sand dunes along Gulf Coast
Leaves not strongly thickened or felty gray-hairy; sandy soils, interior localities.
Pappi of acute or awn-tipped scales or setiform scales 0.4–2 mm
Pappi coroniform, uneven, ciliate, 0.1–0.3 mm, rarely of awn-tipped scales
